SELECT a.id, a.name, a.gender, a.cell_phone as cellPhone, a.email, a.customer_id as customerId, a.update_time as updateTime, b.name as customerName FROM t_contact_person a LEFT JOIN t_customer b ON a.customer_id = b.id
and a.name like concat('%',concat(#{param.name},'%'))
AND b.name = #{param.customerName}
order by a.update_time desc
